body_html:
In future, could you please try to follow the issues submission template.

It is very difficult to reproduce errors when you do not provide the following basic information:

  • What platform / OS are your running on?
  • How did you install TensorFlow? (i.e. what version / package / or source revision)
  • Exactly what command lines did you use to build and execute the program?
body_text:

How did you install TensorFlow?  (i.e. what version / package / or source revision)
Exactly what command lines did you use to build and execute the program?
body:
**In future, could you please try to follow the issues submission template.**  

It is very difficult to reproduce errors when you do not provide the following basic information:
- What platform / OS are your running on?
- How did you install TensorFlow?  (i.e. what version / package / or source revision)
- Exactly what command lines did you use to build and execute the program?
